content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a stone furnace at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5) and transport belts (positions x=63.5, y=-53.5 and x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills and burners have fuel before starting operations.
- Regularly check the fuel status of entities to avoid downtime.

### Errors when entities are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to the electric network to function properly.
- Regularly check the connection status of entities to avoid downtime.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have source items to operate on.
- Regularly check the inventory of entities to avoid downtime.

### Errors when entities have no ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients to smelt.
- Regularly check the inventory of entities to avoid downtime.

### Errors when pipe groups are empty or full
- Ensure that pipe groups are properly connected to entities to function correctly.
- Regularly check the status of pipe groups to avoid downtime.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
